announcement: Sign-up has ended. Results will be released soon.

validation.tooShort: Too short, at least {{length}} characters required

gameInfo.showMoreAriaLabel: Show more of the program item
gameInfo.showLessAriaLabel: Show less of the program item

agreePrivacyPolicy: I agree to the privacy policy
registrationSerialHelp: You can get a registration code from the Larp & RPG Desk, the Gaming Desk or the Info.
noSignedGames: No selected games. You can sign up to program in the All Program view.
noFavoritedProgramItems: No favorites. You can add games here in the All Program view.
noEnteredGames: No sign-ups. You can sign up to program in the All Program view.
signupOpen: Sign-up open for the following times

signupError.noKonstiSignup: This program does not use Konsti for signing up. See the program details for instructions.

closingMessage: Konsti is closed and will open closer to the next event
noLotterySignupResult: Unfortunately, you didn't get a spot in any game in the lottery.
invalidProgramItemId: Program item not found, invalid ID
feedbackInstruction: Did you enjoy the {{PROGRAM_TYPE}}? Send feedback to the organizer! They will receive it after the event.
noProgramItemsAvailable: No {{PROGRAM_TYPE}} found, please check your search conditions.
revolvingDoorInstruction: You can join a revolving door {{PROGRAM_TYPE}} at any time if there is free space

error.cannotUseOwnSerial: You cannot use your own serial to join a group.
error.removePreviousSignupsFailed: Error deleting previous sign-ups, try again.
error.onlyCreatorCanCloseGroup: Only the group creator can close a group.
error.userHasSignedGames: You already have sign-ups. You will have to cancel those before joining a group.
error.alreadyInGroup: You are already a member of a group.
error.creatorHasSignedGames: You already have sign-ups. You will have to cancel those before creating a group.

group.hasEnteredFollowingGames: You have already signed up to these games:
group.cancelSignupBeforeJoiningOrCreatingGroup: You'll have to cancel those sign-ups before you can create or join a group.
group.signupDisabledNotCreator: You are a group member. Your group's creator will sign up the whole group to the lottery.
group.signupForWholeGroup: You are the group creator. You can sign up the group to a lottery.
group.groupCreatorSignups: You are the group creator. Your lottery sign-ups are the same for all group members.
group.inGroupSignups: You are in a group. Sign-ups in this list have been made by your group creator.
group.closeGroupConfirmation: Are you sure you want to close the group and remove all its members?
group.groupTooBigWarning: The group is bigger than the maximum number of players
group.createGroupConfirmationMessage: Do you want to create a group?
group.groupMemberInfo: The group creator will sign the group up to the lottery. You can see the selected games on the "My Program" page.
group.groupCreatorInfo: You can sign up your group to the lottery. Please make sure that the group is not too big for the selected games. The group creator cannot leave the group, but can close it. This will remove all members from the group.
group.groupCodeInfo: Others can join this group with the code
group.joiningGroupWillCancelLotterySignups: Joining a group will cancel all your previous lottery signups.
group.groupLotterySignupGuide: You can enter a lottery sign-up as a group.
group.groupLotterySignupTabletopOnly: Only tabletop RPGs support lottery sign-up.

eventLogActions.newAssignment: You were assigned to the game

signup.alreadyLotterySigned: This game is priority {{CURRENT_PRIORITY}} on your lottery signups
signup.cannotSignupMoreGames: You can select up to three lottery games for the time slot.
signup.alreadySignedToGame: You already signed up to the {{PROGRAM_TYPE}}
signup.cannotSignupMoreThanOneGame: You cannot sign up to another {{PROGRAM_TYPE}} starting at the same time.
signup.inGroupWarning: If you sign up to a game, you will be removed from your current group.
signup.groupCreatorWarning: If you sign up to a game, the group you created will be deleted.
signup.currentSignup: You have signed up to this {{PROGRAM_TYPE}}.
signup.entryFeeInfo: I understand that the workshop requires a material fee of {{ENTRY_FEE}}.
signup.doesNotRequireSignup: This {{PROGRAM_TYPE}} does not require signing up.
signup.noKonstiSignup: This {{PROGRAM_TYPE}} does not use Konsti for signing up. See the program details for instructions.

resultsView.signupResultsFor: Sign-up results for games starting at

firstLogin.serial: Save this code for recovering your password:
firstLogin.info: This message is shown only on your first login. You can also view your code on the Profile & Group page.

accessibility.irritateSkin: Materials or substances that irritate the skin
accessibility.physicalContact: Physical contact and/or low chances of personal space
accessibility.movingAround: Participation involves a lot of moving around without a chance for sitting down
accessibility.video: The programme involves watching a video without subtitles for the hearing impaired
accessibility.recording: Participation requires listening to a recording that does not have a text version for the hearing impaired
accessibility.colourblind: Material used in the programme can cause problems for the colourblind
accessibility.remainingOnePlace: Requires staying still for a long time without possibility of breaks or movement
accessibility.programmeDurationOver2Hours: The duration of the programme is over two hours without breaks
accessibility.limitedOpportunitiesToMoveAround: There are limited opportunities to move around during the programme
accessibility.longText: Participation involves reading long texts independently
accessibility.textNotAvailableAsRecordings: The programme includes texts that are essential to participation, and the texts are not available as recordings or read out loud
accessibility.participationRequiresDexterity: Participation requires some dexterity, e.g. that of hands and fingers
accessibility.participationRequiresReactQuickly: Participation requires the ability to react quickly

backendError.networkError: Network error, connection to server failed

helperView.privateSignupMessagesInfo: Private sign-up info for contacting tournament participants
helperView.question: Question

loginView.oldAccountsNotWorking: Please note that accounts from older events are not in use anymore.
loginView.kompassiLoginHint: Konsti login is done with Kompassi account
loginView.createKompassiAccountHint: Konsti login is not open yet but you can already create Kompassi account which is required for Konsti login.

registrationView.nickVisibleHintText: Your username will be visible to other Konsti users.
registrationView.alreadyHaveAccountLogin: Do you already have an account? Log in here.
